channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- hpb Dashboard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- hpb Dashboard

item.title: CVE-2022-1542|2024-08-03T00:10:02.947Z -- unknown -- hpb%20dashboard
item.description: The HPB Dashboard WordPress plugin through 1.3.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed.
